name: Harmlessly Cute
summary: Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm.
description:
Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm. You gain the Shameless Request skill feat as a bonus feat. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative checks when you roll Deception for initiative.Traits

Leshy: Leshies are living plants animated by primal magic.
